name: Astro Space Mars Food Fight
description:
This game was created for Houdini GameJam 2021.

It's about an astronaut on the Mars, who needs to grow enough food to fly away. He found a technology how to grow finished product. But  strange things happen on the station and food (sometimes) is going to be a flesh-eating mutant (literally). So hurry up!

YOU HAVE TO FIGHT TO SURVIVE, WITH FOOD, FOR FOOD!!!

How to play:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Left Mouse Button - Attack
Right Mouse Button - Action/Grab/Ungrab/Help Plant
Middle Mouse Button - Heal with a food crate

Code & GameDesign: A. Kardakov
Music & GameDesign: A. Howera
Assets: Scifi Unreal Marketplace, Scifi Characters from Unity, Houdini HDA Gamejam, Extended Shading Plugin, Chameleon PP, Elite Landscape Skybox, TPS Adventure Menu Widget, Food Pack
Special thanks: Elena H. as the best our beta tester and girlfriend, Natalya K. as the best wife and supportive friend, Maria K. whose teeth kept me awake.
